title: Ganesh Chaturthi 2025
content:
Wishing all our residents a joyful and prosperous Ganesh Chaturthi! May Lord Ganesha remove all obstacles and bless your homes with happiness, wisdom, and good fortune. 🙏

Let’s celebrate the spirit of unity and auspicious beginnings.

title: Biswakarma Puja 2025
content: Join us in honoring Lord Biswakarma, the divine architect and engineer. A special puja will be held in the community premises followed by prasad distribution and offerings. All residents and support staff are invited to participate and seek blessings for prosperity and skillful living.
